reviewText: Nickelodeon never ceases to be outstanding. this movie was very funny. this movie was very heartfelt. this movie was NOT CHEESY in any way.

This is fun, predictable but fun.  Your kids will love seeing the kid who just can't measure up finally take the prize - don't worry I can't spoil it we already know how it's going to turn out and it's all just a feel good kind of movie where everybody wins in the end - even the bad guy.  Nothing objectionable.
Arrived quicker than estimated in excellent condition.  Son asked for this for christmas at the last minute so I was grateful for the speedy delivery.
This is a great movie and was shipped very quickly.  Item arrived as described.  Very satisfied with purchase!!

Humiliated former Olympic athlete avoids the limelight & his fears by being a gym teacher in a middle school

Meloni does a fine job as the gym teacher.

Amy Sedaris is terrible as the Principal

David Alan Greer is not bad as a rival gym teacher

Nathan Kress is ok as the nerdy overprotected by his mother, but coached & mentored by Meloni to be able to compete

This is a great movie. It will appeal to 7-12 year olds, and also adults. It has Amy Sedaris as the sexually frustrated high school principal  and Chris Meloni as a sexy 40+ y old neurotic loving man with many, I assume deliberate, butt shots. It also stars Bruce Jenner before he became Caitlyn Jenner (check out his facial skin). There are also other brief appearances by great comedians (opening scene for example). There are teenage references to kissing and attraction, and many humorous sexual references that kids will get (not raunchy, but showing a sensitivity to teenage curiosity). It has a great message of inclusivity and overcoming your fears. Well worth seeing. It was made in 2009 so some messages may seem obvious to kids 8-14 nowadays, but if seen as a family movie it could be good fun (especially if you explain who Bruce Jenner became, and the the TV shows Chris Meloni starred in previously).
Kids said it was a good movie to fill time on a road trip. They are 10 and 8 year old boys.  Not sure they loved it enough for a repeat viewing, but it held their attention...
My nieces and nephews watch this DVD constantly.
It was a very entertaining it was cool to see the more comedic side to meloni and also to see Nathan who play Freddie from I Carly
I watched this movie the first time surfing the cable stations. I am a big fan of Christopher Meloni and this is a very different project for him a cut family film. I enjoyed it
I Love Gym Teacher. It's really funny. I also Love Christopher Meloni. Gym Teacher is a really great movie. I also Love the kids in the movie as well.
